text: Beware of privatization! 🚨 New study shows private-sector ER care is 21% more expensive than VHA care. 💰 VCCP providers benefit from follow-up services while avoiding insurance review. 🤔 VHA providers receive specialized training to treat veteran-specific issues. 🏥 Don't let privatization fans like Darin Selnick dismantle our only comprehensive health care model! 💪
